Episodes.Title: Gone in a Flash
Episodes.Plot: When a camera accidentally takes a picture of one of the lemurs at the zoo, King Julien thinks that he's trapped inside of the camera. Using their detective skills, Skipper and the gang search for the lemur before the start of the next zoo tour.

Episodes.Title: Launchtime
Episodes.Plot: The penguins build a rocket to head to the moon after being annoyed by the lemurs. Once they land on the moon, they are greeted by a "moon cat".

Episodes.Title: Haunted Habitat
Episodes.Plot: Marlene, the new zoo otter, meets the penguins for the first time after being startled by a loud noise. Going underground in the sewers, Skipper leads the charge to find the source of the noise.

Episodes.Title: Operation: Plush and Cover
Episodes.Plot: When toy dolls are made to look like Mort at the zoo, Julien gets jealous and has them taken back. Unfortunately, this causes the actual Mort to be shipped back with the toys.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Happy King Julien Day
Episodes.Plot: A festive "King Julien Day" is held in Juliens honor. Unfortunately, no one will come unless Maurice bribes them with candy. And as much as Skipper doesn't want to join in the party, he can't seem to avoid it.

Episodes.Title: Paternal Egg-Stinct
Episodes.Plot: Marlene needs help to keep her eggs.

Episodes.Title: Assault and Batteries
Episodes.Plot: When Julien refuses to turn down his radio, Skipper sneaks into his room to steal his batteries.

Episodes.Title: Penguiner Takes All
Episodes.Plot: The penguins and the lemurs compete in a game of capture the flag.

Episodes.Title: Two Feet High and Rising
Episodes.Plot: After Mort accidentally destroys Julien's floating chair because of his obsession with his feet, the king establishes a law saying that anyone who touches his feet will be banished from the "kingdom". Mort disobeys it in his sleep, causing him to be kicked out forever. However, the penguins make him feet-phobic and he stops obsessing. Later, Julien floats away in his chair and Mort has to save him from falling into a hot dog stand. He becomes obsessed again and saves him from death.

Episodes.Title: Tangled in the Web
Episodes.Plot: When Webcams are installed in the habirats, the penguins begin to rebel.

Episodes.Title: Crown Fools
Episodes.Plot: When Julien's crown falls into a sewer, Skipper sets up a mission to retrieve it. Meanwhile, Marlene tries to calm Julien down.

Episodes.Title: The Hidden
Episodes.Plot: Kowalski searches for his missing friends after the animals of the zoo disappear to look at the new residents.

Episodes.Title: Kingdom Come
Episodes.Plot: When Julien is taken to the zoo infirmary for acting even weirder than usual, Maurice is left in charge. Everything goes smoothly, until suddenly Maurice starts acting even crazier than Julien ever did.

Episodes.Title: All Choked Up
Episodes.Plot: Rico the Penguin is known for being helpful for coughing up random items, but today a zoo keeper gives him de-regurgitating medicine, normally this wouldn't be a problem, except that Rico has a time bomb in his stomach.

Episodes.Title: Little Zoo Coupe
Episodes.Plot: Skipper, Kowalski, Private, and Rico are all having fun today driving around the zoo in their small pink car, but trouble starts when King Julien wants to drive a car too, he gets jealous which results in a race to see who's better.

Episodes.Title: Popcorn Panic
Episodes.Plot: In this Episode, the animals get a liking for popcorn, until a kid is caught feeding them, and Alice the zookeeper hates the idea.

Episodes.Title: Go Fish
Episodes.Plot: The penguins perform and display their cuteness to zoo visitors in order to prompt them to feed them with fish purchased from Alice. Julien observes this from his habitat, stating his resentment of the fish odor to the other lemurs.

Episodes.Title: Miracle On Ice
Episodes.Plot: The penguins' habitat freezes, so they decide to play a hockey game against each other. They are then challenged by a group of rats (the same rats featured in the Crown Fools episode) to play against them, since the rats cannot go back into their sewer home because the pipes burst.

Episodes.Title: Eclipsed
Episodes.Plot: Mason and Phil are fed up with the lemurs annoying them. They find out a solar eclipse is coming and tricked Julien by telling him the "sky spirits" are angry at him just as the moon covers the sun.
Episodes.Writer: Kim Duran, Bob Schooley, Mark McCorkle

Episodes.Title: Needle Point
Episodes.Plot: Skipper runs from the zoo veterinarian in order to avoid getting a shot. The penguins try to force him to do it, but Skipper seems to escape and avoid all they throw at him. Skipper even tries to distract the penguins, as in dancing, trying to attract them.

Episodes.Title: Mort Unbound
Episodes.Plot: Mort quadruples in size after an accident with one of Kowalski's inventions, a super-ray designed to enhance fish. After finally realizing that Mort is super strong, Julien uses him to steal food and supplies from the other animals, like stealing an elephant's peanuts, Joey's (from Assault and Batteries) hay for Julien art work.

Episodes.Title: Roomies
Episodes.Plot: Marlene gets a new roommate named Rhonda, a walrus who is sloppy and has bad manners. Before her roommate arrives, she dances with Skipper and is very excited, but Skipper is paranoid that Marlene's roommate may be a spy, possibly with the intent of stealing Kowalski's newest invention, a device whose function is not yet known.

Episodes.Title: Lemur See, Lemur Do
Episodes.Plot: A space robot is sent to the zoo to learn from King Julien's behavior.

Episodes.Title: Misfortune Cookie
Episodes.Plot: The zoo animals order Chinese food. All of the penguins read their fortune cookies and are happy with the results. However, Rico's fortune reads "You will meet a foul end". While Rico and the penguins do not believe in curses, Julien tries to make them believe by tricking Rico into believing that he is cursed (makes an elephant land on Rico, sends a popcorn cart in his direction) to the point where Rico hides in a pillow fort.

Episodes.Title: Roger Dodger
Episodes.Plot: King Rat and his minions terrorize the penguin's alligator friend, Roger (debut in Haunted Habitat).

Episodes.Title: Skorca!
Episodes.Plot: Private sees a killer whale fly over NYC, but no one believes him, more importantly, Kowalski, Rico, and Skipper think he's gone crazy because of the amount of sugar he had ingested prior to spotting it. In an attempt to prove that he's not crazy, Private heads out to find the whale he knows he saw.
